Quote.Author: Carnie Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: The evening is really hard for me. I have to force myself not to eat

Quote.Author: Carol Ann Duffy
Quote.QuoteValue: I still read Donne, particularly his love poems

Quote.Author: Carol Vorderman
Quote.QuoteValue: The first couple of days on the detox diet aren't pleasant

Quote.Author: Caroline Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: When you make the right decision, it doesn't really matter what anyone else thinks

Quote.Author: Caroline Rhea
Quote.QuoteValue: Someone told me that when they go to Vermont, they feel like they're home. I'm that way at Saks

Quote.Author: Carre Otis
Quote.QuoteValue: It not unusual for women with anorexia to suffer heart attacks

Quote.Author: Carrot Top
Quote.QuoteValue: When I told my friends I was going to be a comedian, they laughed at me

Quote.Author: Carson Kressley
Quote.QuoteValue: We did a whole fraternity house. We made them over

Quote.Author: Carter Burwell
Quote.QuoteValue: The flow of Guiness into the studio was inspirational as well as nutritive

Quote.Author: Cary Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: To succeed with the opposite sex, tell her you're impotent. She can't wait to disprove it

Quote.Author: Casey Affleck
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a very bad relationship with mice

Quote.Author: Cassadee Pope
Quote.QuoteValue: I started singing when I was four years old; that was the first time I took a voice lesson

Quote.Author: Cat Deeley
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't shop because I need something, I just shop for shopping's sake

Quote.Author: Cat Power
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is hard and it gets worse and worse and worse

Quote.Author: Catherine Deneuve
Quote.QuoteValue: I get irritated, nervous, very tense or stressed, but never bored

Quote.Author: Catherine Hardwicke
Quote.QuoteValue: When I read the 'Twilight' book, I didn't see it as fantasy. I saw it as a love story

Quote.Author: Catherine Tate
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing prompts creativity like poverty, a feeling of hopelessness, and a bit of panic

Quote.Author: Chad Hurley
Quote.QuoteValue: Video is the most interesting and engaging way to share an idea with others

Quote.Author: Chad Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been through a lot; that I have

Quote.Author: Chaka Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: Walking through this life really is walking through fire

Quote.Author: Charles Dance
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to be selfish to be an actor

Quote.Author: Charley Pride
Quote.QuoteValue: Once your name becomes well known, politicians come courting

Quote.Author: Charlie Cox
Quote.QuoteValue: I am incredibly self-deprecating. It stems from self-doubt

Quote.Author: Charlie Haden
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't be at your full creative power if you are sedated

Quote.Author: Charlie Hunnam
Quote.QuoteValue: It's generally more fun playing the villain

Quote.Author: Charlie Kaufman
Quote.QuoteValue: I was trying to figure out what a memory feels like

Quote.Author: Charlie Rose
Quote.QuoteValue: The question is just as important as the answer

Quote.Author: Charlie Trotter
Quote.QuoteValue: When I graduated I wasn't sure what I wanted to do, but I knew I didn't want a conventional career

Quote.Author: Charlotte Casiraghi
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a great horseman does not rely on physical strength but more on the mind and sensibility

Quote.Author: Charlotte Rampling
Quote.QuoteValue: If words don't have vibration behind them, and a real feeling behind them, then they're just words

Quote.Author: Chelsea Cain
Quote.QuoteValue: There's not a lot of arc in an actual psychopath

Quote.Author: Cheryl Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't know what I was in for when I joined 'The X Factor' - I underestimated it

Quote.Author: Chet Faker
Quote.QuoteValue: All my ego wants is to be sitting by a lake in Italy. It doesn't want to be backstage, warming up

Quote.Author: China Mieville
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like allegory

Quote.Author: Chino Moreno
Quote.QuoteValue: When I see old friends, I'm very excited

Quote.Author: Chitra Banerjee Divakaruni
Quote.QuoteValue: I like being myself. Maybe just slimmer, with a few less wrinkles

Quote.Author: Chloe Grace Moretz
Quote.QuoteValue: No matter how big you are in the business, at the end of the day it's still work

Quote.Author: Chloe Sevigny
Quote.QuoteValue: I think once you're past 30 you shouldn't wear a lot of glitter

Quote.Author: Chris Colfer
Quote.QuoteValue: I could never rap, personally. I can't even wrap presents

Quote.Author: Chris Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: If conservation isn't conservative, then words have no meaning at all

Quote.Author: Chris Hardwick
Quote.QuoteValue: Comic-Con is nerd Christmas. People go wanting to have fun

Quote.Author: Chris Isaak
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm in showbusiness. I'm an entertainer

Quote.Author: Chris Kirkpatrick
Quote.QuoteValue: Now I'm confused. Now I don't know what I want

Quote.Author: Chris Lilley
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't just want to upset people and shock people by saying something really outrageous

Quote.Author: Chris O'Dowd
Quote.QuoteValue: A guy who's actually self destructive is quite fun to play

Quote.Author: Chris Squire
Quote.QuoteValue: A nightmare is two bassists on stage

Quote.Author: Chris Van Allsburg
Quote.QuoteValue: I write for what's left of the eight-year-old still rattling around inside my head

Quote.Author: Chris Young
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think breakups are ever easy for anybody. If they are, they aren't much of a breakup

Quote.Author: Chrissy Teigen
Quote.QuoteValue: If I'm going to eat fast food, I'm going to McDonald's. I don't need to pretend

Quote.Author: Christa McAuliffe
Quote.QuoteValue: I touch the future. I teach

Quote.Author: Christian Lacroix
Quote.QuoteValue: There are days when I'm completely depressed and able to do only one drawing

Quote.Author: Christian Nestell Bovee
Quote.QuoteValue: Next to being witty, the best thing is being able to quote another's wit

Quote.Author: Christina Hendricks
Quote.QuoteValue: I think calling me 'full-figured' is just rude

Quote.Author: Christine Gregoire
Quote.QuoteValue: It's our responsibility to pass on what we inherited, not to squander it, but to build on it

Quote.Author: Christine Teigen
Quote.QuoteValue: My biggest goal in life is to not be annoying about being a bride

Quote.Author: Christo
Quote.QuoteValue: The work of art is a scream of freedom

Quote.Author: Christoph Waltz
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very bad with improvisation. I hate it

Quote.Author: Christopher Buckley
Quote.QuoteValue: We live - on a spinning planet in a world of spin

Quote.Author: Christopher Guest
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm married to the person I fell in love with

Quote.Author: Christopher Meloni
Quote.QuoteValue: If you try hard enough, you can bend the spoon; you can shift reality

Quote.Author: Chrystia Freeland
Quote.QuoteValue: We recognize that NAFTA is a three-country agreement, and we need a three-country negotiation

Quote.Author: Chuck Grassley
Quote.QuoteValue: Maybe I should just go home and ride my tractor

Quote.Author: Cindy Crawford
Quote.QuoteValue: Having children really changes your priorities

Quote.Author: Cindy Sheehan
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just so honored that the universe chose me to be the spark that has set off a raging inferno

Quote.Author: Claire Denis
Quote.QuoteValue: 'White Material' is about courage and craziness

Quote.Author: Claire McCaskill
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to be willing to offend in order to make progress

Quote.Author: Claire Tomalin
Quote.QuoteValue: After Shakespeare, Dickens is the great creator of characters, multiple characters

Quote.Author: Clarence Clemons
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted an electric train for Christmas but I got the saxophone instead

Quote.Author: Claude Debussy
Quote.QuoteValue: A beautiful sunset that was mistaken for a dawn

Quote.Author: Clive Barker
Quote.QuoteValue: I firmly believe that a story is only as good as the villain

Quote.Author: Clive Owen
Quote.QuoteValue: Jewelery isn't really my thing, but I've always got my eye on people's watches

Quote.Author: Cobi Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know if my hairstyles reflect that, but I am someone who enjoys change

Quote.Author: Coco Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: I had my first girlfriend at 15. Life was difficult then

Quote.Author: Cole Swindell
Quote.QuoteValue: The older I get, the more special time with family gets

Quote.Author: Colin Farrell
Quote.QuoteValue: Being Irish is very much a part of who I am. I take it everywhere with me

Quote.Author: Colin Firth
Quote.QuoteValue: To be bothered wherever you go - it's not a rational thing to want at all

Quote.Author: Colin Trevorrow
Quote.QuoteValue: That's the thing about leaks: sometimes they aren't misinterpreted or false

Quote.Author: Colleen Atwood
Quote.QuoteValue: In real life, a lot of people at that level will have their kimonos made especially for them

Quote.Author: Connie Stevens
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing you wear is more important than your smile

Quote.Author: Constance Baker Motley
Quote.QuoteValue: When Thurgood Marshall became a lawyer, race relations in the United States were particularly bad

Quote.Author: Coolio
Quote.QuoteValue: Acting is all about timing. I mean, who has better timing than the MCs?

Quote.Author: Corey Feldman
Quote.QuoteValue: I have led a pretty colorful life

Quote.Author: Corey Hawkins
Quote.QuoteValue: I think, in our darkest moments, you have to find the humor, and you have to find the lightness

Quote.Author: Corey Lewandowski
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd love to say second place is great, but it's not

Quote.Author: Courtney Barnett
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just not very comfortable talking about my emotions on a normal, day-to-day basis

Quote.Author: Craig Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: A decent beard has long been the number one must-have fashion item for any fugitive from justice

Quote.Author: Craig Bruce
Quote.QuoteValue: It's hardware that makes a machine fast. It's software that makes a fast machine slow

Quote.Author: Cristela Alonzo
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, a multi-cam is just like the feeling you get from the audience

Quote.Author: Curt Schilling
Quote.QuoteValue: I was raised to understand and know the difference between right and wrong

Quote.Author: Cynthia Kenyon
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always gotten a thrill, a kick, from learning new things

Quote.Author: Cynthia Nixon
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd do a show about garbagemen if it was good!

Quote.Author: Cynthia Ozick
Quote.QuoteValue: Traveling is seeing; it is the implicit that we travel by

Quote.Author: Cynthia Weil
Quote.QuoteValue: We are the yin and the yang of the creative process

Quote.Author: D. A. Pennebaker
Quote.QuoteValue: I heard the new film, 'Tangerine,' was filmed entirely on iPhones. No cameras were involved!

Quote.Author: D. H. Lawrence
Quote.QuoteValue: Men! The only animal in the world to fear

Quote.Author: Dada Vaswani
Quote.QuoteValue: Sincere practice, makes the impossible possible

Quote.Author: Dag Hammarskjold
Quote.QuoteValue: Friendship needs no words - it is solitude delivered from the anguish of loneliness

Quote.Author: Daisaku Ikeda
Quote.QuoteValue: With love and patience, nothing is impossible

Quote.Author: Dale Earnhardt
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a never ending battle of making your cars better and also trying to be better yourself

Quote.Author: Daley Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: Sport fosters many things that are good; teamwork and leadership

Quote.Author: Damian Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: Seeing a man praying to Allah is enough for some people to assume he is a terrorist

Quote.Author: Damien Chazelle
Quote.QuoteValue: As a drummer, you're always fighting for a level that you never quite attain

Quote.Author: Dan Aykroyd
Quote.QuoteValue: You do not need a therapist if you own a motorcycle, any kind of motorcycle!

Quote.Author: Dan Gable
Quote.QuoteValue: Once you've wrestled, everything else in life is easy

Quote.Author: Dan Gilbert
Quote.QuoteValue: I think Detroit is where muscle meets brains

Quote.Author: Dan Harmon
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a fine line between a stream of consciousness and a babbling brook to nowhere

Quote.Author: Dan Rather
Quote.QuoteValue: A tough lesson in life that one has to learn is that not everybody wishes you well

Quote.Author: Dana Perino
Quote.QuoteValue: Sarcasm is like cheap wine - it leaves a terrible aftertaste

Quote.Author: Daniel Barenboim
Quote.QuoteValue: When playing music, it is possible to achieve a unique sense of peace

Quote.Author: Daniel Cormier
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to be a champion in all facets of life

Quote.Author: Daniel Craig
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always retained my privacy, but now I protect it even more

Quote.Author: Daniel Da
Quote.QuoteValue: ewis - My main memories of my father are of his illness

Quote.Author: Daniel Goleman
Quote.QuoteValue: True compassion means not only feeling another's pain but also being moved to help relieve it

Quote.Author: Daniel Humm
Quote.QuoteValue: I never finished high school. In fact, I hated going to school

Quote.Author: Daniel J. Boorstin
Quote.QuoteValue: The greatest obstacle to discovery is not ignorance - it is the illusion of knowledge

Quote.Author: Daniel Kahneman
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a wonderful thing to be optimistic. It keeps you healthy and it keeps you resilient

Quote.Author: Daniel Keys Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: You can have data without information, but you cannot have information without data

Quote.Author: Daniel Radcliffe
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people think I am gay, which I think is awesome

Quote.Author: Daniel Webster
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no refuge from confession but suicide; and suicide is confession

Quote.Author: Danny McBride
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't really care about awards

Quote.Author: Danny Meyer
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is a series of waves to be embraced and overcome

Quote.Author: Daryl Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: Reject what you don't want. Get rid of dead wood

Quote.Author: Dave Attell
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was a kid, I really loved Indians. Native Americans. Pardon. Me

Quote.Author: Dave Barry
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody cares if you can't dance well. Just get up and dance

Quote.Author: Dave Chappelle
Quote.QuoteValue: You know you must be doing something right if old people like you

Quote.Author: Dave Eggers
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not that our family has no taste, it's just that our family's taste is inconsistent

Quote.Author: Dave Grohl
Quote.QuoteValue: If there's one thing I'm good at, it's gathering people together to do something fun

Quote.Author: Dave Matthews
Quote.QuoteValue: A friend is always good to have, but a lover's kiss is better than angels raining down on me

Quote.Author: Dave Mustaine
Quote.QuoteValue: Moving on, is a simple thing, what it leaves behind is hard

Quote.Author: Dave Ramsey
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that through knowledge and discipline, financial peace is possible for all of us

Quote.Author: David Attenborough
Quote.QuoteValue: Crying wolf is a real danger

Quote.Author: David Bailey
Quote.QuoteValue: A positive attitude can really make dreams come true - it did for me

Quote.Author: David Beckham
Quote.QuoteValue: I still look at myself and want to improve

Quote.Author: David Blaine
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that fear of life brings a greater fear of death

Quote.Author: David Blunkett
Quote.QuoteValue: That is why with enormous regret I have tendered my resignation to the prime minister today

Quote.Author: David Byrne
Quote.QuoteValue: Real beauty knocks you a little bit off kilter

Quote.Author: David Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a country boy at heart

Quote.Author: David Chang
Quote.QuoteValue: Life's too short to just breeze on by

Quote.Author: David Duchovny
Quote.QuoteValue: The happiest moment of my life was probably when my daughter was born

Quote.Author: David Duval
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a silly old game

Quote.Author: David Fincher
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything seems really simple on paper until you take a camera out of the box

Quote.Author: David Guterson
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a certain nostalgia and romance in a place you left

Quote.Author: David Hasselhoff
Quote.QuoteValue: I think people know that I've got a good heart

Quote.Author: David Hockney
Quote.QuoteValue: Listening is a positive act: you have to put yourself out to do it

Quote.Author: David Hume
Quote.QuoteValue: The life of man is of no greater importance to the universe than that of an oyster

Quote.Author: David Icke
Quote.QuoteValue: The best way of removing negativity is to laugh and be joyous

Quote.Author: David Lee Roth
Quote.QuoteValue: Money can't buy you happiness, but it can buy you a yacht big enough to pull up right alongside it

Quote.Author: David Letterman
Quote.QuoteValue: If it wasn't for the coffee, I'd have no identifiable personality whatsover

Quote.Author: David Lynch
Quote.QuoteValue: This whole world is wild at heart and weird on top

Quote.Author: David Mamet
Quote.QuoteValue: What I value most in my friends is loyalty

Quote.Author: David McCullough
Quote.QuoteValue: A nation that forgets its past can function no better than an individual with amnesia

Quote.Author: David Ogilvy
Quote.QuoteValue: Never stop testing, and your advertising will never stop improving

Quote.Author: David Petraeus
Quote.QuoteValue: Every civilian's death diminishes us, collectively

Quote.Author: David Schwimmer
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to challenge myself. I like to learn - so I like to try new things and try to keep growing

Quote.Author: David Sedaris
Quote.QuoteValue: I go to the movies at least five times a week, and after a while everything becomes a blur to me

Quote.Author: David Shields
Quote.QuoteValue: In many senses, creativity and 'plagiarism' are nearly indivisible

Quote.Author: David Suzuki
Quote.QuoteValue: We must reinvent a future free of blinders so that we can choose from real options

Quote.Author: David Whyte
Quote.QuoteValue: The great poems are not about experience, but are the experience itself, felt in the body

Quote.Author: Davy Crockett
Quote.QuoteValue: You may all go to Hell, and I will go to Texas

Quote.Author: Daymond John
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a big advocate of financial intelligence

Quote.Author: Dean Kamen
Quote.QuoteValue: Every once in a while, a new technology, an old problem, and a big idea turn into an innovation

Quote.Author: Dean Koontz
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes there is no darker place than our thoughts, the moonless midnight of the mind

Quote.Author: Dean Ornish
Quote.QuoteValue: What matters most is your overall way of eating and living

Quote.Author: Debbie Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: We have to choose faith even if we don't feel it. Or hold on to a friend who has faith

Quote.Author: Debbie Harry
Quote.QuoteValue: Being hot never hurts!

Quote.Author: Debbie Reynolds
Quote.QuoteValue: I gave it all that I had, and it's gratifying that others seem to be receiving it so well

Quote.Author: Debi Mazar
Quote.QuoteValue: With the breast-feeding, I really love the bonding. Real life is more important to me

Quote.Author: Deborah Tannen
Quote.QuoteValue: Each person's life is lived as a series of conversations

Quote.Author: Dee Hock
Quote.QuoteValue: Every mind is a room packed with archaic furniture

Quote.Author: Deepika Padukone
Quote.QuoteValue: I like statement earrings

Quote.Author: Dele Alli
Quote.QuoteValue: We've got to be right mentally - to stay focused and not get carried away if results go our way

Quote.Author: Demetri Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanna make a jigsaw puzzle that's 40,000 pieces. And when you finish it, it says 'go outside.'

Quote.Author: Demi Lovato
Quote.QuoteValue: Creativity is what helps me escape a lot of my inner demons

Quote.Author: Democritus
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness resides not in possessions, and not in gold, happiness dwells in the soul

Quote.Author: Denis Diderot
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to make it happen

Quote.Author: Denis Leary
Quote.QuoteValue: Not eating meat is a decision, eating meat is an instinct

Quote.Author: Denis Villeneuve
Quote.QuoteValue: The problem in cinema is that you can never predict what will happen

Quote.Author: Denis Waitley
Quote.QuoteValue: A smile is the light in your window that tells others that there is a caring, sharing person inside

Quote.Author: Dennis Farina
Quote.QuoteValue: I think first impressions are important when you pick up a script

Quote.Author: Dennis Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: A recent police study found that you're much more likely to get shot by a fat cop if you run

Quote.Author: Dennis Potter
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything we do has consequences

Quote.Author: Dennis Prager
Quote.QuoteValue: The Left has always sought single, non-values-based explanations for human behavior

Quote.Author: Dennis Quaid
Quote.QuoteValue: I always want to find the best burger in town

Quote.Author: Dennis Rodman
Quote.QuoteValue: This life is like a swimming pool. You dive into the water, but you can't see how deep it is

Quote.Author: Denzel Washington
Quote.QuoteValue: You pray for rain, you gotta deal with the mud too. That's a part of it

Quote.Author: Derek Bok
Quote.QuoteValue: There is far too much law for those who can afford it and far too little for those who cannot

Quote.Author: Derek Jeter
Quote.QuoteValue: I love it when people doubt me. It makes me work harder to prove them wrong

Quote.Author: Desi Arnaz
Quote.QuoteValue: Joe McCarthy and his Senate hearings were like witch-hunts

Quote.Author: Desiderius Erasmus
Quote.QuoteValue: Give light, and the darkness will disappear of itself

Quote.Author: Diana Ross
Quote.QuoteValue: If I have someone who believes in me, I can move mountains

Quote.Author: Diane Arbus
Quote.QuoteValue: A photograph is a secret about a secret. The more it tells you the less you know

Quote.Author: Diane von Furstenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I never knew what I wanted to do, but I knew the kind of woman I wanted to be

Quote.Author: Dianne Feinstein
Quote.QuoteValue: Women have begun to see that if I go through that doorway, I take everybody through it

Quote.Author: Dick Cavett
Quote.QuoteValue: If your parents never had children, chances are... neither will you

Quote.Author: Dick Cheney
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a deficit hawk

Quote.Author: Dick Dale
Quote.QuoteValue: Every song is like a painting

Quote.Author: Dick Gregory
Quote.QuoteValue: If it wasn't for Abe Lincoln, I'd still be on the open market

Quote.Author: Dick Van Dyke
Quote.QuoteValue: I've made peace with insecurity... because there is no security of any kind

Quote.Author: Diego Costa
Quote.QuoteValue: My mindset is always to be victorious, to win the match

Quote.Author: Diego Maradona
Quote.QuoteValue: My mother thinks I am the best. And I was raised to always believe what my mother tells me

Quote.Author: Dierks Bentley
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was 13, I was just figuring out how to play 'Eruption,' poorly, by Eddie Van Halen

Quote.Author: Dimebag Darrell
Quote.QuoteValue: The worst advice I ever received from my dad was to play by the book

Quote.Author: Dinesh D'Souza
Quote.QuoteValue: Obama gets his identity and his ideology from his father

Quote.Author: Diogenes
Quote.QuoteValue: The foundation of every state is the education of its youth

Quote.Author: Dita Von Teese
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always loved the idea of not being what people expect me to be

Quote.Author: Divyanka Tripathi
Quote.QuoteValue: I really believe that some things happen for a reason, and they make you a better person

Quote.Author: DJ Khaled
Quote.QuoteValue: You gotta water your plants. Nobody can water them for you

Quote.Author: DMX
Quote.QuoteValue: I just find myself happy with the simple things. Appreciating the blessings God gave me

Quote.Author: Don Cornelius
Quote.QuoteValue: Love, peace and soul

Quote.Author: Don King
Quote.QuoteValue: Hypocrisy is the mother of all evil and racial prejudice is still her favourite child

Quote.Author: Don Miguel Ruiz
Quote.QuoteValue: Every human is an artist. The dream of your life is to make beautiful art

Quote.Author: Don Rickles
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't study comedy; it's within you. It's a personality. My humor is an attitude

Quote.Author: Don Shula
Quote.QuoteValue: The superior man blames himself. The inferior man blames others

Quote.Author: Donald Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything important always begins from something trivial

Quote.Author: Donald Judd
Quote.QuoteValue: Most art is fragile and some should be placed and never moved away

Quote.Author: Donald Rumsfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't blame the boss. He has enough problems

Quote.Author: Donatella Versace
Quote.QuoteValue: Fashion is about dreaming and making other people dream

Quote.Author: Donna Brazile
Quote.QuoteValue: I was motivated to be different in part because I was different

Quote.Author: Donna Karan
Quote.QuoteValue: Age and size are only numbers. It's the attitude you bring to clothes that make the difference

Quote.Author: Donnie Yen
Quote.QuoteValue: Martial art is a form of expression, an expression from your inner self to your hands and legs

Quote.Author: Doris Lessing
Quote.QuoteValue: Things are not quite so simple always as black and white

Quote.Author: Dorothea Dix
Quote.QuoteValue: What greater bliss than to look back on days spent in usefulness, in doing good to those around us

Quote.Author: Dorothy Day
Quote.QuoteValue: We have all known the long loneliness, and we have found that the answer is community

Quote.Author: Dorothy Hamill
Quote.QuoteValue: I never really liked my short hair; it never occurred to me that people would want it

Quote.Author: Dorothy L. Sayers
Quote.QuoteValue: I love you - I am at rest with you - I have come home

Quote.Author: Doug Ducey
Quote.QuoteValue: Ice cream brings people together

Quote.Author: Doug Larson
Quote.QuoteValue: A true friend is one who overlooks your failures and tolerates your success!

Quote.Author: Douglas Coupland
Quote.QuoteValue: The time you feel lonely is the time you most need to be by yourself

Quote.Author: Dove Cameron
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't make eye contact when people sing 'Happy Birthday' to me

Quote.Author: Dr. Dre
Quote.QuoteValue: My mother got pregnant with me at the age of fifteen. This was '64, and unheard of at that time

Quote.Author: Drew Barrymore
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is very interesting... in the end, some of your greatest pains, become your greatest strengths

Quote.Author: Drew Carey
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no way I can justify my salary level, but I'm learning to live with it

Quote.Author: Duane Michals
Quote.QuoteValue: Trust that little voice in your head that says 'Wouldn't it be interesting if...'; And then do it

Quote.Author: Dustin Hoffman
Quote.QuoteValue: The two basic items necessary to sustain life are sunshine and coconut milk

Quote.Author: Dwayne Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: If I love you, I show you I love you every day. Little things, big things

Quote.Author: Dwight L. Moody
Quote.QuoteValue: I have had more trouble with myself than with any other man

Quote.Author: Dwight Yoakam
Quote.QuoteValue: Musicians exist independent of any of the marketing terms or the categorization

Quote.Author: Dwyane Wade
Quote.QuoteValue: No team works out teamwork

Quote.Author: Dylan Lauren
Quote.QuoteValue: Believe in yourself, listen to your gut, and do what you love

Quote.Author: Dylan Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: Have I had therapy? I went to a yoga class once

Quote.Author: Dylan Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: When one burns one's bridges, what a very nice fire it makes

Quote.Author: Dabney Coleman
Quote.QuoteValue: But I did make some money doing commercials. I did fourteen in one year

Quote.Author: Daisy Berkowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: We were like psychedelic folk combined with Sonic Youth's noise

Quote.Author: Daisy Ridley
Quote.QuoteValue: I love to come to L.A. to visit, and then I like to come to rainy old London because it's home

Quote.Author: Dale Murphy
Quote.QuoteValue: When you come right down to it, I guess I really am pretty bland

Quote.Author: Damian Loeb
Quote.QuoteValue: I always thought being an artist was a lazy job. I was wrong

Quote.Author: Dan Buettner
Quote.QuoteValue: Have fun, be active. Ride a bike instead of driving, for example

Quote.Author: Dan Fogelberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I never going to satisfy everybody, so I decided to satisfy myself

Quote.Author: Dan O'Brien
Quote.QuoteValue: If you never give up, you'll be successful

Quote.Author: Dana Brunetti
Quote.QuoteValue: What I find most exciting about online video is that it's the future
